page.title: 02Court Farm, Bishops Cleeve
page.content: Court Farm is a farm of 300 acres (124 hectares), and marks the western edge of the parish of Bishops Cleeve. It is a long narrow farm bordered to the west by the main line railway between Birmingham and Bristol. {The farmer and his family: { } The farmer is Fred Knight. His wife Vera and two sons Raymond and Peter work full time on the farm. Raymond married to Denise has a son Simon aged one year whom he hopes will one day follow the family tradition on the farm. Raymond is particularly interested in animal husbandry, and it was his wish after studying agriculture at Hartpury College to change the farm from beef to milk production.
